name: Asteroids by Thomas Wrabetz
description:
An Asteroids game. There are various powerups, 10 types of enemies that come in different combinations, and elites that appear after your score is high enough. Play single or co-op (Same keyboard) and try to get a high score!

CONTROLS:

1P: Arrow key/WASD to move. Note down/S is a backwards teleport

Space: push enemies away, or use abilities you gain through powerups

2P: P1 arrow keys and space, P2 WASD and LeftShift.

Have fun!
